data.text: @UtahCoronavirus @MulticulturalUT You harassed everyone, not just ethnic minorities.
@UtahCoronavirus @MulticulturalUT Almost makes you wish that people like you hadn't politicized Covid and turned it into a religion instead of a disease, now doesn't it?
@UtahCoronavirus @MulticulturalUT You mean by the government who demonized the unvaccinated, and minorities were (justifiably) the most apprehensive?
